Let's find the pattern that connects each number.

$2\underset{\blueD?}{{\rightarrow}}4\underset{\blueD?}{\rightarrow} 8 \underset{\blueD?}{\rightarrow} 16$

The pattern starts at $2$ and multiplies by $2$ each time.

$2\underset{\blueD{\times2}}{{\rightarrow}}4\underset{\blueD{\times2}}{\rightarrow} 8 \underset{\blueD{\times2}}{\rightarrow} 16$

So, if we want to know what the next number will be, we need to extend the pattern:

$\overset{\greenD1}2\underset{\blueD{\times2}}{{\rightarrow}}\overset{\greenD2}4\underset{\blueD{\times2}}{\rightarrow} \overset{\greenD3}{8} \underset{\blueD{\times2}}{\rightarrow} \overset{\greenD4} {16}\underset{\blueD{\times2}}{\rightarrow} \overset{\greenD5}{32}$
The next number in the pattern will be $32$.
